name: @sveltinio/services
description: Integrate GoogleFonts, Analytics, and Umami in Svelte projects.
readme:
@sveltinio/services

 
## Description Type-safe Svelte components to easily use GoogleFonts, GoogleAnalytics and Umami in your Svelte and SvelteKit projects. ## Demos You can see live demos [here](https://www.sveltelab.dev/mu01l23m3291k52) or if you clone the repos by running `pnpm dev` ## Components List - [GoogleFonts] - [GoogleAnalytics] - [UmamiAnalytics] ## Install ```bash # pnpm pnpm install @sveltinio/services # npm npm install @sveltinio/services # yarn yarn add @sveltinio/services ``` ## License Free and open-source software under the [MIT License](LICENSE) [GoogleFonts]: https://github.com/sveltinio/components-library/tree/main/packages/services/src/lib/components/google/fonts [GoogleAnalytics]: https://github.com/sveltinio/components-library/tree/main/packages/services/src/lib/components/google/analytics [UmamiAnalytics]: https://github.com/sveltinio/components-library/tree/main/packages/services/src/lib/components/umami
